name: Ducky Tales
description:
• Ducky Tales •

Ducky Tales is an addicting and fun adventure game that you wont be able to stop playing. Jump on obstacles and avoid enemies that will try to stop you. Use ladders to find alternate paths. Find portals for quick teleportation.

• FEATURES •

- Multiple different levels to play
- Obstacles ranging from a trampoline, elevator or a spring well
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
- Addicting gameplay
- Fun themes
- The way you move around is very important
- Try to outrun the viking before he bites you
- Watch out for incoming enemies, watch out for traps
- Be careful of portals and where they can teleport you

FREE adventure fun is just a tap away. Download Ducky Tales today!
